questions.question:
Q24. What’s wrong with this JavaScript?

alternatives.alternative: JSON should be wrapped with curly braces.
The value supplied to JSON.parse() is not a string.

questions.question: Q54. Which key format is valid JSON?

Keys and values should be enclosed with single quotes.

No, you can never assume object keys will be in order.
